text:
@NikkiHaley Really?!? GOP talking points of LIES, HATE, & FEAR Mongering. What about the FAILURE of TRUMP & GOP to Keep Americans Safe? The GOP LIED, Delayed & Profited off  #coronavirus while 136k have died! What about military bounty?
#ComplicitCorruptGOP
#GOPBetrayedAmerica 
#PutinsGOP
